name: Chakra Heroes - Captain America Avengers Edition
name_original: Chakra Heroes - Captain America Avengers Edition
description:
All Super Heroes born on the Asgard world. Chakra is power of Heroes.

The super hit game "Chakra Heroes Game" is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!


Switch and match your way through unlimited levels in this addictive puzzle adventure.


Chakra Heroes Game features:

● Cute graphics that will leave you hungry for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● unlimited levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Items to unlock by completing levels
● Boosters to help with those challenging levels
● Seamless synchronisation with the Facebook version
